caption.title: CDFs of inverse persistence (θ) for CMIP5 models and NCEP/NCAR reanalysis.
caption.p: Inverse persistence (θ) CDFs for the synoptic systems in eight CMIP5 models (table S2) and the NCEP/NCAR reanalysis over 1986–2005: ( A) CANESM, ( B) CCSM4, ( C) HadGEM2CC, ( D) HadGEM2ES, ( E) NCEP/NCAR reanalysis, ( F) IPSL, ( G) MPI, ( H) MRI, and ( I) NORESM.
